title: League of Legends ERROR
body:
My league of legends client has stopped working, at first it recommended that i uninstall and re-download the game.. so i did, and now i cant even get the game to go from its legacy form to the updated form. I get the screen image saying its ready to start, but when i press LAUNCH i get a pop up error code saying that league might not be able to run on windows?! or there is an error in one of the codes or something... i was just playing the game earlier today, i dont understand whats going on i just want to play some league... ive uninstalled and re-downloaded the game about 5 different times now, all ending with the same results =[ 

_**PLEASE HELP**_

replies.body:
Hmmmm this might be happening if some of the game files weren't installed properly or somehow became corrupted. Follow the steps in the image below, but let me know if that doesn't help!
